PokerPlayerMod:DamnStraightPower.NAME: Damn Straight
DESCRIPTIONS: Showdown bonus from Straight is
doubled.
multiplied by #b
almost infinite. Beware of integer overflow!

DESCRIPTIONS: During Showdown, your Diamonds deal #b

DESCRIPTIONS: During Showdown, your Clubs give you #b

PokerPlayerMod:HardenPower.NAME: Harden
DESCRIPTIONS: During Showdown, your Spades give you #b

DESCRIPTIONS: You score a Flush if you have #b
or more Poker Cards with same Suit.

PokerPlayerMod:GamblerFormPower.NAME: Gambler Form
DESCRIPTIONS: If you score Two Pair or better, the Showdown effect of all Poker cards are increased by #b

PokerPlayerMod:CardPrinterPower.NAME: Card Printer
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a random non-Heart #yRank #b
Poker card to your discard pile.

PokerPlayerMod:StackedDeckPower.NAME: Stacked Deck
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, Look at the top #b
cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.

turn.
